DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective evaluation effect splenic irradiation clinical hematological response toxicity patient chronic lymphatic leukaemia ( CLL ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Splenic Irradiation Chronic Lymphatic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: The study include patient CLL treat splenic irradiation Maastro Clinic , Maastricht , The Netherlands , Maxima Medisch Centrum Veldhoven/Catharina hospital , Eindhoven , The Netherlands Modena hospital , Modena , Italy . Data collect patient record uniform database . Data include demographic data , CLL stadium ( RAI Binet ) diagnosis time irradiation treatment , clinical data diagnosis ( haematology ) , splenic irradiation data , follow-up data date progression death
